subject: Request Info collaboration
description_text:
Good morning, I'm writing from Italy. I run a large gaming community called
Black Lion Italia. I have a well-followed YouTube and Facebook channel
called Black Lion Italia. You can do a Google search and see.

I have a PC sim racing team in the Assetto Corsa and iRacing games with 53
active drivers.

I'd like to promote your products and accessories and make videos and
reviews to encourage purchases.

I'd like to receive one of your products as a sample and test it at a 50%
discount. In exchange, I can create a video review and promote it on my
channels. I can use your logo or company name to advertise.

Is it possible? Would you be interested in this opportunity? I'm waiting.

Luca P.

blacklionitalia


<http://www.blacklionitalia.it>

Gaming Community Since 2002

conversations.body_text: Hi Luca,  Good morning, and thank you for reaching out! We truly appreciate your interest in collaborating with us, and it’s great to hear about your Black Lion Italia community — 53 active sim-racing drivers is impressive, and we’re glad you’re considering featuring our products.  At the moment, we’re unable to offer a 50% sponsorship discount, but we can provide a special 25% exclusive discount code: BLI25, which you and your team can use for purchasing and testing our products.  If you decide to create review or promotion content, we would be very happy to see it — and you’re welcome to display our logo or brand name in your videos and posts.  Thank you again for the opportunity. If you have any questions or need support during your testing or setup, feel free to contact us anytime.  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Thank you for your reply. I understand your difficulty, but unfortunately
25% is really not enough. I'll offer you constant advertising on YouTube
and Facebook for three months. Every week, a new video (I'll send you
videos you've watched) where I promote your website's product and your
brand. It's a lot of work that will surely yield important results for you.
If we can raise 40%, I'll proceed with the purchase.
Please evaluate and research my business.
Best regards,
Luca
blacklionitalia <http://www.blacklionitalia.it>
YouTube
Facebook
